abstract: The strong demand for Apple’s new devices mirrors growing consumer interest in smartphones with bigger screens.
snippet: The strong demand for Apple’s new devices mirrors growing consumer interest in smartphones with bigger screens.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s investors obsess over early iPhone sales like Hollywood producers tracking opening ticket sales for a blockbuster movie.

headline.main: First-Weekend Sales of Apple’s iPhone 6 Models Top 10 Million
headline.print_headline: First-Weekend Sales of 2 Apple iPhones Top 10 Million

byline.original: By Brian X. Chen and Mike Isaac
